personal.name: Richard Karanu
personal.title: Senior Full Stack Software Engineer
personal.tagline: Building the Future, One Line at a Time
personal.bio: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 6+ years of hands-on product experience building and shipping real products in VC-backed startups and high-growth companies. Proven track record of taking complete ownership from concept to deployment.

highlights: Built entire technical infrastructure from zero for AI-driven job-resume matching platform
Shipped production-ready product processing 1,000+ resumes daily with 97% matching accuracy
Led technical decision-making and architecture choices
Managed full product lifecycle from MVP to scale
Architected secure multi-tenant API infrastructure achieving 99.9% uptime
Optimized API performance, reducing response time from 800ms to 200ms
Led onboarding and mentoring of 3 new engineers
Established comprehensive API documentation improving onboarding by 60%
Architected AI-powered compliance platform reducing document review time by 20x
Implemented Azure Cognitive Services pipeline processing 1,000+ pages daily
Engineered real-time news verification system reducing false positives by 40%
Designed secure document handling system achieving SOC2 compliance
Built secure backend systems handling 100,000+ API requests with zero incidents
Created context-aware AI agents achieving 90% SQL generation accuracy
Developed Miksi AI SDK with 200+ downloads and zero critical bugs
Led team of 3 to 85% sprint completion rate
Engineered scalable backend systems supporting 1,000+ concurrent users
Optimized PostgreSQL queries achieving 60% faster response for 10,000+ daily requests
Implemented JWT authentication handling 50,000+ daily requests with zero breaches
Built WebSocket-based real-time communication system with 99.9% uptime
Led end-to-end development of 8+ custom applications maintaining 95% client satisfaction
Architected scalable solutions reducing client operational costs
Established autonomous project management framework with zero scope creep
Implemented data-driven solutions enabling 3x faster decision-making

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Technology
